title: Transition From Auth To Dem Governments

content.question: Which of the following best demonstrates that a country has transitioned from an authoritarian government to a democratic government?

choices.label: Elected officials are better able to influence judicial rulings.
Multiple political parties join to form a single dominant political party.
The chief executive has greater authority than the legislature.
Elections for public office are more transparent and competitive.

content.answer: Elections for public office are more transparent and competitive.

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Compare political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
